name: image-classification-project
description: Image Classification Frontend and Backend Monorepo

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:preview: cd frontend && npm run build && firebase hosting:channel:deploy preview
